purpose: halloween and costume archetypes for character prompts, mixing classic, professional, historical, pop‑culture, and absurdist concepts

categories.monsters_supernatural: classic halloween monsters and occult figures plus nonhuman creatures (vampires, witches, ghosts, mummies, angels/devils, fairies, aliens, robots, scarecrows, pumpkins)
categories.professions: jobs, sports, and service roles with recognizable uniforms (nurse, firefighter, astronaut, chef, athletes, surgeon, pilot, soldier, librarian, mail carrier)
categories.historical_period: period and medieval archetypes and royalty (pirates, cowboys, knights, gladiators, pharaohs, monks, royal guards, victorian figures, jesters)
categories.pop_culture_parodies: celebrity/franchise references and brand spoofs (guy fieri, grimace riffs, off‑brand spider‑man, shrek gags, blockbuster, myspace, titanic vhs, furby, kool‑aid man)
categories.absurdist_personified: surreal gags and anthropomorphic objects or twisted everyday scenarios (haunted roomba, traffic cone, cvs receipt, ai chatbot crisis, hr scarecrow, tax auditor from hell)
categories.animals_anthro: animal‑themed costumes and animals in human contexts (cat, dog, raccoon in people clothes)
